sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const SignLanguageGuide = () => { const words = [ { english: 'Yes', chinese: '是', hksl: Nod head or thumb up }, { english: 'No', chinese: '不是', hksl: Shake head or wave hand }, { english: 'Restaurant', chinese: '餐廳', hksl: Mimicking eating motion }, { english: 'Hong Kong', chinese: '香港', hksl: 'HK fingerspelling' }, { english: 'Sign Language', chinese: '手語', hksl: 'Two hands signing' }, { english: 'Water', chinese: '水', hksl: 'W-hand to mouth' }, { english: 'Hot', chinese: '熱', hksl: Fan face with hand }, { english: 'Umbrella', chinese: '雨傘', hksl: 'Mimic opening umbrella' }, { english: 'What', chinese: '什麼', hksl: Shake open hand }, { english: 'Where', chinese: '哪裡', hksl: 'Point index fingers' }, { english: 'Who', chinese: '誰', hksl: Chin stroke }, { english: 'Understand', chinese: '明白', hksl: Palm to forehead }, { english: "Don't understand", chinese: '不明白', hksl: Cross arms }, { english: 'Delicious', chinese: '好吃', hksl: 'Rub stomach' }, { english: 'Thank you', chinese: '謝謝', hksl: 'Gesture of gratitude' }, ]; return (

Basic Words in English, Traditional Chinese, and Hong Kong Sign Language

{words.map((word, index) => ( ))}
English Traditional Chinese HKSL Description
{word.english} {word.chinese} {word.hksl}
); }; export default SignLanguageGuide;
